mapper.select: SELECT flow_sort.*,countflow.FLOW_COUNTS,department.DEPT_NAME FROM flow_sort LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(flow_type.FLOW_ID) AS FLOW_COUNTS,flow_type.FLOW_SORT FROM flow_type GROUP BY flow_type.FLOW_SORT ) AS countflow ON countflow.FLOW_SORT=flow_sort.SORT_ID LEFT JOIN department ON department.DEPT_ID=flow_sort.DEPT_ID ORDER BY SORT_ID,SORT_NO ASC
SELECT COUNT(flow_type.FLOW_ID) AS FLOW_COUNTS,flow_type.FLOW_SORT FROM flow_type WHERE flow_type.FLOW_SORT=0 or flow_type.FLOW_SORT IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM flow_sort WHERE flow_sort.SORT_PARENT=#{sordId}
SELECT COUNT(flow_type.FLOW_ID) AS FLOW_COUNTS,flow_type.FLOW_SORT FROM flow_type WHERE flow_type.FLOW_SORT=#{flowId}

SELECT flow_sort.* FROM flow_sort , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(flow_sort.SORT_ID) childId,GROUP_CONCAT(flow_sort.SORT_PARENT) parentId FROM flow_sort INNER JOIN flow_type ON flow_type.FLOW_SORT = flow_sort.SORT_ID INNER JOIN flow_process ON flow_process.FLOW_ID=flow_type.FLOW_ID AND flow_process.PRCS_ID in ( SELECT MIN(flow_process.PRCS_ID) FROM flow_process WHERE flow_process.FLOW_ID=flow_type.FLOW_ID ) AND (
FIND_IN_SET(#{user},flow_process.PRCS_USER) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{deptId},flow_process.PRCS_DEPT) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{privId},flow_process.PRCS_PRIV) OR flow_process.PRCS_DEPT='ALL_DEPT' OR
FIND_IN_SET(#{item},flow_process.PRCS_PRIV) OR
FIND_IN_SET(#{item},flow_process.PRCS_DEPT) OR
) GROUP BY flow_sort.SORT_ID) AS child WHERE FIND_IN_SET(flow_sort.SORT_ID,child.parentId) OR FIND_IN_SET(flow_sort.SORT_ID,child.childId) GROUP BY flow_sort.SORT_ID ORDER BY flow_sort.SORT_ID ,flow_sort.SORT_NO ASC
